data.Title: Google Search Updates
data.Description: Google has made several updates to its search engine, including testing auto-playing video thumbnails in search results, confirming that ads can show up below organic featured snippets, and making more use of the right sidebar on desktop and overlays on mobile.

data.Title: Bing Tests Voting on Search Results
data.Description: Bing is testing a new feature that allows users to vote on search results, with the percentage of votes for each result displayed.

data.Title: Google Search Console Updates
data.Description: Google Search Console has new settings for businesses to enter their shipping and return policies. It also now lets you enter your shipping and return information directly in the settings section.

data.Title: Google My Business Removes Thumbtack Links
data.Description: Google My Business is removing Thumbtack booking and appointment links from business profiles.

data.Title: OpenAI Developments
data.Description: OpenAI is reportedly working on a search product and a project code-named "Strawberry" to improve AI model reasoning capabilities.

data.Title: COPIED Act Seeks to Protect Content from AI Use
data.Description: The COPIED Act is a new Senate bill that aims to protect artists' and journalists' content from being used without permission by AI systems.

data.Title: Amazon's AI Shopping Assistant Rufus Launches
data.Description: Amazon's AI shopping assistant, Rufus, is now available to all US customers in the Amazon mobile app.

data.Title: Majestic to Discontinue Disavow Links Feature
data.Description: Majestic will discontinue its disavow links feature, stating that it is not an effective way to identify toxic links.

data.Title: 3D/AR Objects Expand in Google Search Results
data.Description: 3D/AR objects are appearing in Google Search results for more retailers.

data.Title: Samsung Revamps Bixby with AI Focus
data.Description: Samsung is revamping its Bixby voice assistant with a focus on AI to compete with Google Assistant and Apple's Siri.
